info.property: Eric Le Carre <e.lecarre@hotmail.com>, Grégoire Chabord, Philippe Grivel <phgrivel@gmail.com>

entry.string:
The freedb CDDBP protocol cannot be used over HTTP Forward proxies!
Would you like to change the protocol to HTTP?

section.entry:
Le protocole CDDBP freedb ne peut pas être utilisé sur les serveurs proxy HTTP Forward !
Voulez-vous passer au protocole HTTP ?

section.name: Tags

entry.string: Replace existing comments with default comment

section.entry: Remplacer les commentaires existant par ceux par défaut

entry.string: Add reference to audio file tag
Read cue sheets embedded in metadata
Prefer cue sheets over chapter information
Prepend zero to track numbers below 10
Verify that lossless inputs decode to exactly the data they were originally created from.
Verify that lossless outputs decode to exactly the data used when encoding them.
Conversion to a single output file
Treat the combined tracks like a single track

section.name: About
section.entry: Des mises à jour de %1 sont disponibles en ligne ! Voulez-vous afficher la liste des mises à jour disponibles maintenant ?
Actuellement, aucune mise à jour n'est disponible !

entry.string: This program is being distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License (GPL).

section.entry: Rechercher les mises à jour au démarrage

section.name: Updates

entry.string: There are new updates for %1 available online! Would you like to see a list of available updates now?

section.entry: %1 est disponible en %2 langues. Si votre langue n'est pas disponible, vous pouvez facilement traduire %1 à l'aide de l'application 'smooth Translator'.

entry.string: There are no updates available at the moment!

section.entry: %1 prend en charge les encodeurs LAME, Ogg Vorbis, FAAC, FLAC et Bonk. L'encodeur pour le format VQF est disponible sur le site Web de %1 : %2

%1 peut exploiter les plug-ins d'entrée de Winamp 2 afin de prendre en charge un plus grand nombre de formats de fichiers. Copiez les fichiers in_*.dll dans le répertoire %1/plugins pour faire en sorte que %1 lise ces formats.

entry.string:
%1 can perform an automatic check for online program updates at startup.
Would you like %1 to look for updates at startup?

section.entry: %1 vous permet de soumettre des entrées de base de données de CD freedb comportant des caractères Unicode. Si vous avez des CD comportant des noms d'artistes ou des titres non latins, vous pouvez soumettre les bonnes entrées freedb avec %1.

section.name: Tips

entry.string: %1 is available in %2 languages. If your language is not available, you can easily translate %1 using the 'smooth Translator' application.

section.entry: La tâche d'encodage est toujours en cours d'exécution ! Voulez-vous vraiment quitter ?

entry.string: %1 comes with support for the LAME, Ogg Vorbis, FAAC, FLAC and Bonk encoders. An encoder for the VQF format is available at the %1 website: %2
%1 can use Winamp 2 input plug-ins to support more file formats. Copy the in_*.dll files to the %1/plugins directory to enable %1 to read these formats.

section.entry: Impossible de charger les pilotes ASPI ! Extraction du CD désactivée !

entry.string: With %1 you can submit freedb CD database entries containing Unicode characters. So if you have any CDs with non-Latin artist or title names, you can submit the correct freedb entries with %1.
To correct reading errors while ripping you can enable Jitter correction in the Ripper tab of %1's configuration dialog. If that does not help, try using one of the Paranoia modes.
Do you have any suggestions on how to improve %1? You can submit any ideas through the Tracker on the %1 SourceForge project page - %2 or send an eMail to %3.

section.entry: Cette option va supprimer les fichiers initiaux après leur encodage ! Voulez-vous vraiment continuer ?

entry.string: Do you like %1? %1 is available for free, but you can help fund the development by donating to the %1 project. You can send money to %2 through PayPal. See %3 for more details.

section.name: Messages

entry.string: A conversion process is still active! Do you really want to quit?
Unable to load ASPI drivers! CD ripping disabled!

section.entry: Impossible de charger les pilotes ASPI ! Extraction du CD désactivée !

entry.string: Cannot play a CD track while ripping from the same drive!
Cannot start ripping while playing a track from the same drive!

This option will remove the original files from your computer after the encoding process!
Are you sure you want to activate this function?

section.entry: Cette option va supprimer les fichiers initiaux après leur encodage ! Voulez-vous vraiment continuer ?

entry.string: The output file %1 already exists! Do you want to overwrite it?

section.entry: Le fichier de sortie %1 existe déjà ! Voulez-vous le remplacer ?

entry.string: CDDB support is disabled! Please enable local or remote CDDB support in the configuration dialog.

section.entry: La prise en charge CDDB est désactivée ! Activez la prise en charge locale ou distante dans la boîte de dialogue de configuration.

entry.string: Remote CDDB support is disabled! Please enable remote CDDB support in the configuration dialog.

section.entry: La prise en charge CDDB distante est désactivée ! Activez la prise en charge distante dans la boîte de dialogue de configuration.

entry.string:
Access to CD-ROM drives was denied by Windows.
Please contact your system administrator in order to be granted the right to access the CD-ROM drive.

section.entry:
Windows a refusé l'accès aux lecteurs de CD-ROM.
Adressez-vous à votre administrateur système pour obtenir le droit d'accès au lecteur de CD-ROM.
Impossible d'accéder au fichier de sortie : %1

entry.string:
You seem to be converting from a lossy to a lossless format.
Please be aware that quality loss cannot be undone, so this process will not improve quality in any way, and most likely increase file size.
Would you like to continue anyway?

Checksum mismatch verifying output file: %1
Encode checksum: %2 Verify checksum: %3
The selected folder does not exist anymore!
Keep this option enabled even after restarting %1
The following %1 files already exist and will be overwritten
The selected tracks have different sample formats. Please select the desired sample format of the output file:
Read ISRC when adding tracks to joblist

section.name: MAD
section.entry: S'il vous plait supporter ce projet!

entry.string: Prefer cue sheet metadata over referenced files' tags
Look for compressed alternatives if referenced Wave files cannot be located
Ignore errors during cue sheet processing
Maximum AAC frequency bandwidth to use (Hz)

section.name: Format

entry.string: Allow ID3v2 tags in AAC files

section.entry: Autoriser les balises ID3v2 dans les fichiers AAC

entry.string: Some players may have problems playing AAC files with ID3 tags attached. Please use this option only if you are sure that your player can handle these tags.

section.entry: Certains lecteurs peuvent avoir des difficultés à lire les fichiers AAC comportant des balises ID3. Utilisez cette option seulement si vous êtes certain que votre lecteur sait gérer ces balises.

section.name: Expert

entry.string: You can specify multiple functions separated by semicolons.

section.entry: Vous pouvez indiquer plusieurs fonctions séparées par des points-virgules.

section.name: WMA
section.entry: Ecriture des fichiers WMA non compressés

entry.string: Automatically select format based on settings and input format

section.entry: Sélectionne automatiquement le format en se basant sur les paramètres et le format d'entrée

entry.string: Could not find suitable audio format.
Unable to use selected audio format.
Create a separate folder for each output format

section.name: Donate
section.entry: S'il vous plait supporter ce projet!

entry.string: Please help keep this software free by supporting the %1 project with a donation.
Please write to %1 if you would like to mail a check or send money by mail.
Click one of the buttons below to make a donation using PayPal:
You can also send money directly to %1 using PayPal.
Donorbox enables quick and simple donations by credit card. Click this button to make a donation using Donorbox:
Please scan or click the QR code or copy the following address to donate Bitcoin:
This address also accepts Bitcoin Cash and other forks.
Please scan or click the QR code or copy the following address to donate Ethereum:
This address also accepts Ether Classic and ERC20 tokens.
You can donate by making a SEPA transfer to the following account:
Automatically download URLs copied to clipboard
Select the folder to save downloaded video files to
This URL is not supported or not a video page URL!
You are already downloading this video!

Some required video decoders could not be found. Video files cannot be added to the joblist for conversion to audio files.
Please install avconv or FFmpeg to fix this problem!
Show Protocols tab in main window
